tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (S (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP 've) (VP (VBN had) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB stay) (PP (IN after) (NP (NN school))) (NP-TMP (NP (RB almost) (JJ everyday)) (NP (DT this) (NN week))))))))) (CC and) (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (MD might) (VP (VB have) (PP (TO to) (NP (NN tomorrow)))))))))
